titles.title: Keeping Our Commitment to Overseas Veterans Act of 2019
Keeping Our Commitment to Overseas Veterans Act of 2019

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to extend the authority for operation of a Department of Veterans Affairs regional office in Manila, the Republic of the Philippines, and for other purposes.
Keeping Our Commitment to Overseas Veterans Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
